languages.text: "Что же за времена настали, если за безделье и душегубство одинаково судят?"

traits.locale_text: "Что же за времена настали, если за безделие и душегубство одинаково судят?"

languages.text: "Same trial for a slacker as for a killer? What times are we living in?"
languages.original_text: "Что же за времена настали, если за безделье и душегубство одинаково судят?"

traits.locale_text: "Same trial for a slacker as for a killer? What kind of times are these?"
"Same trial for a slacker as for a killer? What kind of times are these?"
"Same trial for a slacker as for a killer? What times are we living in?"
"Same trial for a slacker as for a killer? What times are we living in?"
"Same trial for a slacker as for a killer? What times are we living in?"
"Same trial for a slacker as for a killer? What times are we living in?"

languages.text: “懒鬼和杀人犯一样判死刑？这到底是什么世道啊？”
languages.original_text: "Same trial for a slacker as for a killer? What times are we living in?"

traits.locale_text: “懒鬼和杀人犯一样判死刑？这到底是什么世道啊？”

languages.text: 「怠け者と殺人者が同じ裁判だって？どんな時代だよ」
languages.original_text: "Same trial for a slacker as for a killer? What times are we living in?"

traits.locale_text: 「怠け者と殺人者が同じ裁判だって？どんな時代だよ」

languages.text: «¿El mismo juicio para un vago que para un asesino? ¿En qué tiempos vivimos?».
languages.original_text: "Same trial for a slacker as for a killer? What times are we living in?"

traits.locale_text: «¿El mismo juicio para un vago que para un asesino? ¿En qué tiempos vivimos?».

languages.text: "Derselbe Prozess für einen Faulpelz und für einen Mörder? In was für Zeiten leben wir nur?"
languages.original_text: "Same trial for a slacker as for a killer? What times are we living in?"

traits.locale_text: "Derselbe Prozess für einen Faulpelz und für einen Mörder? In was für Zeiten leben wir nur?"

languages.text: « Alors si je comprends bien, on juge maintenant les tire-au-flanc au même titre que les assassins ? Mais où va le monde... »
languages.original_text: "Same trial for a slacker as for a killer? What times are we living in?"

traits.locale_text: « Alors si je comprends bien, on juge maintenant les tire-au-flanc au même titre que les assassins ? Mais où va le monde... »

languages.text: "İşten kaytaran biri ve bir katil, aynı mahkemeye mi çıkıyor? Nasıl zamanlarda yaşıyoruz?"
languages.original_text: "Same trial for a slacker as for a killer? What times are we living in?"

traits.locale_text: "İşten kaytaran biri ve bir katil aynı mahkemeye mi çıkıyor? Nasıl zamanlarda yaşıyoruz?"
